name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Reveals His Earthquake Powers
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard demonstrates the full might of the Gura Gura no Mi by creating massive quakes in the air at Marineford.
keyMoments.significance: First full display of Whitebeard's legendary Devil Fruit powers at Marineford, establishing why he's called the Strongest Man in the World.
keyMoments.quote: I'm Whitebeard! Let's begin this war!

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Creates Twin Tsunamis
keyMoments.description: Using the Gura Gura no Mi, Whitebeard creates two massive tsunamis on both sides of Marineford.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the world-ending potential of Whitebeard's Devil Fruit and why it's considered the strongest Paramecia.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Defeats the Spade Pirates
keyMoments.description: In flashback, Whitebeard easily defeats the Spade Pirates after their five-day battle with Jinbe.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Whitebeard's overwhelming strength and establishes his relationship with Ace.
keyMoments.quote: You who challenged me should step forward!

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Takes Full Responsibility for Ace
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard tells Ace that he was the one who ordered him to pursue Blackbeard, taking full responsibility as a father.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the depth of Whitebeard's love for Ace as a son and explains why he would risk everything to save him.
keyMoments.quote: I told you to go. I'm the one who ordered you to go after Teach!

abilities.description: Whitebeard creates massive earthquakes and shockwaves through the air and sea.
Whitebeard creates enormous tsunamis by causing earthquakes in the ocean.

relationships.description: Whitebeard considers Ace his son and takes full responsibility for his actions.

evolutionMoments.description: Whitebeard declares he ordered Ace to pursue Blackbeard, protecting Ace's honor as a father would.

reveals.information: Full display of Gura Gura no Mi earthquake and tsunami creation powers
How Whitebeard recruited Ace after defeating the Spade Pirates
The depth of Whitebeard's fatherly love for Ace, taking full responsibility for his decisions

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace as Captain of the Spade Pirates
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals Ace was captain of his own crew, the Spade Pirates, before joining Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial backstory on Ace's journey and establishes his credentials as a powerful pirate.

keyMoments.title: Ace Declined Becoming a Warlord
keyMoments.description: Revealed that Ace turned down an invitation to become one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ace's independence and ambition, demonstrating he had bigger goals.

keyMoments.title: Ace vs Jinbe Five-Day Battle
keyMoments.description: Ace fights Jinbe for five days straight with neither able to defeat the other.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ace's incredible strength and endurance, being able to fight a Warlord to a standstill.

keyMoments.title: Ace Accepts Whitebeard as His Father
keyMoments.description: Ace stops trying to kill Whitebeard and comes to respect and love him as a father figure.
keyMoments.significance: Crucial character development showing Ace's transformation from a lone wolf to someone who found family.

keyMoments.title: Ace Becomes Second Division Commander
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard promotes Ace to Second Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ace's important position and shows Whitebeard's complete trust in him.

keyMoments.title: Ace Meets Shanks
keyMoments.description: Ace meets with Shanks to thank him for saving Luffy's life.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ace's gratitude for Shanks saving his brother and the respect between powerful pirates.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you for saving my little brother.

keyMoments.title: Ace Decides to Pursue Blackbeard
keyMoments.description: Against Whitebeard's orders, Ace decides to hunt down Blackbeard for killing Thatch.
keyMoments.significance: This decision leads directly to his capture and the War at Marineford.
keyMoments.quote: Let me go after him, Pops. Teach was part of my division. I'm responsible.

bounties.reason: Second Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates

relationships.description: Ace considers Whitebeard his father and is deeply devoted to him.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback shows how Ace went from trying to kill Whitebeard to accepting him as his father.

relationships.description: After their five-day battle, Ace and Jinbe developed mutual respect.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace and Jinbe fight for five days with neither able to defeat the other.

relationships.description: Ace is grateful to Shanks for saving Luffy's life.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace meets Shanks to personally thank him for saving Luffy.

relationships.description: Ace is determined to hunt down Blackbeard for killing Thatch.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace decides to pursue Blackbeard to avenge Thatch's death.

reveals.information: Ace was captain of the Spade Pirates before joining Whitebeard
Ace turned down an offer to become a Warlord of the Sea
Ace fought Jinbe for five days to reach Whitebeard
Ace repeatedly tried to assassinate Whitebeard before accepting him as his father
Ace personally met Shanks to thank him for saving Luffy

keyMoments.title: Jinbe vs Ace Five-Day Battle
keyMoments.description: Jinbe fights Ace for five days straight in the flashback, defending Whitebeard's territory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's incredible power and endurance as a Warlord and his loyalty to Whitebeard.
keyMoments.quote: I won't let you pass! Whitebeard is my savior!

relationships.description: Jinbe considers Whitebeard his savior and protects his territory.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe fights Ace for five days to protect Whitebeard's territory.

relationships.description: After their five-day battle, Jinbe and Ace developed mutual respect.

evolutionMoments.description: Five-day battle establishes respect between the two fighters.

reveals.information: Jinbe fought Ace for five days when Ace tried to reach Whitebeard
Jinbe considers Whitebeard his savior and protects his territory

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Murders Thatch
keyMoments.description: In flashback, Blackbeard kills Thatch to steal the Yami Yami no Mi Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: This murder is the inciting incident that led to Ace pursuing Blackbeard and ultimately the War at Marineford.

reveals.information: Thatch was murdered by Blackbeard to steal the Yami Yami no Mi
